mapper.select:
select TITLE_ as c , VALUE_ as v from health_dietary_statistics
where ( TYPE_ = #{type.stringVal} )
AND ( TENANTID_ = #{tenantId.stringVal} )
AND ( SUITNO_ = #{suitNo.intVal} )
AND ( DAYOFWEEK_ = #{dayOfWeek.intVal} )
AND ( DAYOFWEEK_ = 9999 )
order by SORTNO_ asc
